column1: Little Goat Diner////I also liked that they allowed us to split our checks however we wanted
column2: instead of some strict rules that are unnecessary. This place is just across the street from the girl and the goat
column3: and it is connected to a bar and a coffee house that is also affiliated with the girl and the goat. You can buy some souvenir or cookbook while you wait for a table. Oh the cutest part is
column4: well of course everything has a goat on here if you order a drink or something
column5: but I think the cutest part is there are individual coat hooks by each booth :)
